overview:
Synthetix provide multi-channel customer service solutions to some of the world’s best known brands. The company has over 10 years of experience in deploying class-leading web self-service solutions.

Synthetix creates bespoke customer service and knowledge base software that enables customers to self-serve timely, accurate answers to their questions via the web, mobile phones and on social networks. Our call-centre knowledge base helps agents get instant answers to customer enquiries, improving customer experience and satisfaction levels. All of our solutions allow escalation to seamlessly integrated live chat software.
